description:

Eventually Rob reaches across and returns the favor. Score!

Rob must have thought it was an invitation as he teasingly worked his way down to Jherrad�s dick! This was turning out to be an adventurous video after all!
This video is not fast-paced, it's not filled with lots of moaning and groaning, but it is filled with lots of dynamic tension that just slowly builds to an explosive ending!
title: Jherrad & Rob - Serviced
